name: claude-flow-multi-agent-orchestration
description: Multi-agent orchestration system for data science workflows

scripts.swarm:data-analysis: node core/cli.js orchestrate 'Comprehensive data analysis pipeline' parallel high --show-result
scripts.swarm:ml-pipeline: node core/cli.js orchestrate 'End-to-end ML model development and evaluation' sequential high --show-result
scripts.swarm:research: node core/cli.js orchestrate 'Research and comparative analysis' adaptive medium --show-result
scripts.test:basic: npm run setup && npm run swarm:init && npm run swarm:spawn-all && npm run swarm:status-detailed
scripts.test:orchestration: npm run test:basic && npm run swarm:data-analysis
scripts.demo: npm run test:orchestration && npm run swarm:cleanup

author: Claude Multi-Agent System
